name: Oblong Industries, Inc.
description: Oblong Industries, Inc. is an innovative technology company specializing in advanced visual collaboration solutions. Founded in 2006, Oblong aims to redefine the way people interact with digital information and each other through its groundbreaking software and hardware products. The company is best known for its flagship product, Mezzanine, which provides immersive video conferencing and collaboration experiences that enable teams to work together seamlessly, regardless of their physical locations. Oblong's technology leverages spatial computing and gesture recognition, allowing users to manipulate and share content in real-time on a multi-screen environment. This unique approach enhances productivity and creativity, making it particularly popular in sectors such as design, architecture, and education. With a commitment to pushing the boundaries of human-computer interaction, Oblong continues to invest in research and development to deliver next-generation solutions that meet the evolving needs of modern workplaces. The company is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, and serves a global client base, including Fortune 500 companies and government organizations. Oblong remains dedicated to fostering collaboration and innovation, driving the future of teamwork through technology.
